title: "Stori Raises $200 Million for Financial Services for the Underserved"
excerpt: "Mexico-based Stori landed $200 million this week in combined debt and equity. The investment, which bring the company’s total funding to almost $250 million, will help the fintech provide financial services to its region’s underserved customers."
